explains: v. 中断，扰乱；彻底改变（某物）的结构，使（某物）的结构破裂；使瓦解，使分裂

sentences.en: A stroke can disrupt the supply of oxygen to the brain.
sentences.cn: 中风可导致大脑供氧中断。

sentences.en: They can disrupt experiments with the bacteria organisms they carry.
sentences.cn: 他们可以通过携带的细菌来扰乱实验。

sentences.en: Damage to the cerebellum can disrupt motor activity in other ways.
sentences.cn: 小脑损伤可能连带影响运动机能。
